hero.question: Want to know if your idea works?
hero.description: Validate your project with a {mvpBold}â€”the simplest version of your idea that worksâ€”and generate your first leads without writing a single line of code.
hero.step1Description: In 48h you have your working product
hero.step2Description: We test with real users and measure
hero.step3Description: If it works, we develop the full version

context.painPoint1Description: You have the perfect vision but don't know where to start
context.painPoint2Description: You don't have time or money to hire a complete team
context.painPoint3Description: Without a real product, it's hard to convince investors or users
context.mainPainDescription: We know how frustrating it is to have a brilliant idea and see it stay only on paper. Time passes, motivation fades, and your dream remains just that... a dream.
context.opportunityDescription: to investors or first users before the week ends.
context.opportunityQuote: Instead of explaining your idea with words, you demonstrate it with facts. Your credibility skyrockets and opportunities multiply.
context.methodologyDescription: We start with an MVP that validates your project and then we scale together. From initial idea to sustainable growth, step by step.

process.title: My commitment to you
process.subtitle: Total transparency in the process. No unrealistic promises, just serious work and results.
process.commitment1Description: I develop a functional Minimum Viable Product ready to deploy. No unnecessary features, just the essentials to validate your idea quickly.
process.commitment2Description: If you decide to move forward, your MVP will be deployed and accessible online in less than a week. Domain included if needed.

cta.title: Have an idea you want to validate?
cta.description: Tell me about your project and I'll respond with an honest analysis and action plan

testimonials.title: Our clients' opinion
testimonials.subtitle: Real projects we have developed and the results our clients obtained
testimonials.ctaDescription: Each of these projects started as a simple idea. In 48 hours, you could have your MVP ready to validate and generate your first results.
